form.title: New Test Run
form.description: Configure a new test run for a URL. Select one or more test suites to execute.
form.urlDescription: The full URL of the endpoint you want to test.
form.testSuitesDescription: Select the types of tests you want to perform on the target URL.
form.k6SwitchDescription: Simulate traffic to measure performance under load.
form.seoSwitchDescription: Perform a deep on-page SEO analysis with AI.

error.atLeastOne: At least one test suite must be selected.

form.requestConfigDescription: Define the details of the HTTP request for the load test.
form.loadProfileDescription: Choose a preset or define a custom load profile.
form.customProfileDescription: Define a custom load profile if the presets do not meet your needs.
form.stagesDescription: Define ramping stages for more complex load patterns.

toast.historyClearedDescription: Your previous test history and recent URLs have been cleared.
toast.testStartedDescription: Your test is running. You can view live results in Grafana.

clearHistoryDialog.title: Clear Existing Test History?
clearHistoryDialog.description: Running a new test will clear any previous test history from your browser's local storage. This ensures that the Grafana dashboard shows only the current test's metrics. Would you like to proceed?

running.title: Test in Progress...
running.description: Please wait while the tests are being executed. This may take several minutes depending on the configuration.

summary.title: Test Complete
summary.description: The test run for {{url}} has finished. See the summary below.

history.title: Test History
history.description: Review and manage your past test runs.
history.noHistoryDescription: Run a new test to see its results here.

toast.exportSuccessDescription: Your test history has been saved to a JSON file.
toast.importSuccessDescription: Test history has been successfully imported.
toast.importFailDescription: Could not import the selected file.
toast.importInvalidFormat: The imported file has an invalid format.
toast.deleteSuccessDescription: The test run has been removed from your history.
toast.clearSuccessDescription: All test history has been deleted.

clearAllDialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete all history?
clearAllDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all test run history and recent URLs from your browser storage.

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this test run from your history.

about.title: The Ultimate Local-First Testing Suite
about.description: K6 Commander is an all-in-one, local-first platform that empowers you to run sophisticated load tests, Lighthouse audits, and AI-powered SEO checks without cloud dependencies or privacy concerns.
about.localFirstDescription: All your data stays on your machine. Test configurations and results are stored in your browser, not on our servers.
about.unifiedToolingDescription: Stop switching between tools. Configure, run, and analyze all your performance tests from a single, intuitive interface.
about.k6FeatureDescription: Leverage the full power of k6, Grafana, and InfluxDB in a tightly integrated, containerized environment.
about.k6HowItWorks: When you run a load test, the app spins up a dedicated k6 Docker container. This container executes the test script against your target URL, configured with the parameters you set in the UI.
about.k6HowItWorks2: Metrics are streamed in real-time to an InfluxDB container and visualized in a pre-configured Grafana dashboard, giving you live insights into your application's performance.
about.lighthouseFeatureDescription: Go beyond just load testing. Get actionable insights with Google Lighthouse.
about.lighthouseHowItWorks: The application spawns a headless Google Chrome instance via `npx` to run a full Lighthouse audit directly from the server.
about.lighthouseHowItWorks2: It analyzes your page for performance, accessibility, best practices, and SEO, then presents the scores in a clean summary and links to the full, detailed HTML report.
about.seoFeatureDescription: Get a competitive edge with deep on-page SEO analysis, powered by generative AI.
about.seoHowItWorks: Your page's raw HTML is securely sent to our backend, which uses Google's Gemini model via Genkit to perform a comprehensive analysis.
about.seoHowItWorks2: The AI checks for critical elements like title tags, meta descriptions, canonicals, and more, providing not just a status but also actionable recommendations for improvement.
about.stackDescription: Built with modern, powerful, and open-source technologies you can trust.
about.involvedDescription: K6 Commander is open source. Contributions, bug reports, and feature requests are always welcome.

tour.step1: Start by entering the full URL of the web page or API endpoint you want to test.
tour.step2: Next, choose which tests you want to run. You can select any combination of Load Testing, Lighthouse Audits, and AI-powered SEO Analysis.
tour.step3: If you're running a load test, you can choose from several common presets or define your own custom stages and user load.
tour.step4: Once you're ready, click here to start your tests! You'll be taken to a new view to monitor the progress.

apiTester.noResponseYetDesc: Send a request to see the response here.
apiTester.newCollectionDescription: Create a new collection to organize your API requests.
apiTester.noRequestsDescription: Your sent requests will appear here.

toast.jsonFormatErrorDescription: The text in the body is not valid JSON.
toast.cannotDeleteDefault: The default 'Scratch Pad' collection cannot be deleted.
toast.curlCopiedDescription: The cURL command has been copied.

deleteCollectionDialog.title: Delete Collection?
deleteCollectionDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the '{{name}}' collection and all of its requests? This action cannot be undone.

deleteRequestDialog.title: Delete Request?
deleteRequestDialog.description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this request from your history?
